destinationList.name: Miami
destinationList.address: is the capital of the Indian state of West Bengal. Located on the east bank of the Hooghly River

destinationList.name: Fort Lauderdale
destinationList.address: Explore past & present Fort Lauderdale from its birthplace along the New River. 3 Museums. Photo Spot. Docent Tours. Unique Gifts. Amenities: Museums, Tours, Riverwalk.

destinationList.name: Nassua, The Bahamas
destinationList.address: Nassau and Paradise Island have no shortage of sand, although their beaches are not quite as impressive as the long, deserted stretches you find in the Bahamas' Out Island. ... Cabbage Beach on Paradise Island is one of the most beautiful soft, white sand beaches in the world.

destinationList.name: Palm Beach
destinationList.address: Palm Beach is a suburb in the northern beaches region of Sydney, in the state of New South Wales, Australia. Palm Beach is located 41 kilometres (25 mi) north of the Sydney central business district, in the local government area of Northern Beaches Council.
